item.title: I need help so people can only use my client
item.dc:creator: @FrozenLord FrozenLord
item.description:
@FrozenLord wrote:

i mclovin i:

go on client.java in your client folder and look for ip change it to your ip and than save compile than compress it to .zip and then upload and there you go. and yah you cant connect with your client because your useing 127.0.0.0 default ip cause your hostingg the server but if it was hosted on different comp than you would be able to connect with a no-ip.

umm its not in gui.java in client folder?

Read full topic
